name: Rhombus Legends
description: A unique spatial battle system for card games. Unite with friends for clan wars, explore the dungeons and search world map for Bosses. Magical power awaits you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
